summary: AppHeader now references `/assets/generated/header-music-note.dim_128x128.png` for the header logo while keeping the same `w-10 h-10` wrapper and `img` sizing classes. However, the required PNG asset file itself is not shown as added under `frontend/public/assets/generated/`. Additionally, unrelated project metadata/summary files were modified that were not requested.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the new music-note icon image as a static asset under `frontend/public/assets/generated/` and reference it directly from the header ``.
missing_requirements.reason: The header references the new asset path, but the diff shows no added files (and specifically no PNG added under `frontend/public/assets/generated/`), so the image may be missing at build/runtime.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified `frontend-file-summaries.txt` (project-wide summary content) even though the request was only to swap the header icon source.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest did not ask to update any summary/metadata files; only `AppHeader.tsx` and adding a static asset were required.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified `project_state.json` to add/track new feature requests (AR-1..AR-4).
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest did not request changes to project tracking/state files; the change is unrelated to swapping the header icon.
